raw_body: Beloved wife of Lakshman (Chairman, E.H. Cooray and Sons Ltd/Lakshmans group) loving mother of Roshini; mother-in-law of Dinesh Dharmadasa precious grandmother of Diroshan, Deelaka and Reshmi. Daughter of Late Mr and Mrs G.L.P. de Silva of Ambalangoda; daughter-in-law of Late Mr and Mrs E.H. Cooray of Moratuwa.
